title: Differential Impact of Left Atrial Volume on Post-Ablation Recurrence Rates in Patients with Normal and Reduced Left Atrial Ejection Fraction: A DECAAF II …
details: M Bsoul, Y Liu, A Assaf, ghassan bidaoui, Y Jia… - Circulation, 2024
abstract: Background: The left atrial volume (LAV) has been known to be positively correlated with the atrial fibrillation (AF) recurrence rates after catheter ablation (CA) but negatively correlated with the left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF). We …
